page.title: 16Health in Llanelli.
page.content: Llanelli has one General Hospital.A new Hospital is due to be built to replace it in 1986.The site has already been prepared.The Hospital has all the facilities for general patient care except Maternity Care.All mothers-to-be have to travel to Morriston or Carmarthen for the birth of their babies.There are three homes for the aged in our block together with a Geriatric Hospital.Most Doctor's Surgeries are new,having been built in the last few years to accomodate larger Group Practices.There are adequate Dental Surgeries in Llanelli,all of which are in this block.There are also two Clinics in the block,one of which is for Schools.There are five Opticians,three Chiropodists, an Osteopath and two Physiotherapists in the area.
